name: South Windsor Bulky Waste Collection
materials: Air Conditioners; Bed Mattresses; Box Springs; Carpet; Dehumidifiers; Furniture; Large Household Appliances; Refrigerators; Scrap Metal; Used Tires
notes:
Bulky items collection occurs once a month during the First Full Week of the month, beginning on Monday, on your normal refuse collection day. Bulky items must be separated from other refuse and recyclables and placed at the curb by 7:00 a.m. for collection. 
For collection of scrap metal, appliances, or items with freon you must call 860-644-2511 x 343 to arrange pick-up.
